00022 #ifndef INBREDSTATUS_H
00023 #define INBREDSTATUS_H
00024 
00025 //
00026 #include "chipstream/BioTypes.h"
00027 //
00028 #include <cstring>
00029 #include <string>
00030 #include <vector>
00031 //
00032 
00033 /**
00034  * @brief Class for determining inbreeding covariate from a cel set of cel files.
00035  */
00036 class InbredStatus {
00037 
00038 public:
00039 
00040   /** 
00041    * Get the inbreeding status for the cel files that have been seen.
00042    * @return - vector of inbreeding covariates, one for each cel file in order seen.
00043    */
00044   virtual std::vector<double> getInbredStatus() = 0;
00045 
00046   std::string getInbredName() { return m_InbredName; }
00047   std::string getInbredDescription() { return m_InbredDescription; }
00048 
00049   virtual ~InbredStatus(){}
00050 
00051 protected:
00052   std::string m_InbredName;
00053   std::string m_InbredDescription;
00054   
00055 };
00056 
00057 /**
00058  * @brief Instance of InbredStatus which provides null covariates 
00059  */
00060 class NoInbredStatus : public InbredStatus {
00061 
00062 public:
00063     NoInbredStatus(int numberChips) {
00064         m_InbredStatus.resize(numberChips);
00065         for(size_t i=0; i<m_InbredStatus.size(); i++)
00066             m_InbredStatus[i] = 0;
00067         m_InbredName = "none";
00068         m_InbredDescription = "no inbreeding status, no modifications to likelihood";
00069     }
00070     std::vector<double> getInbredStatus() { return m_InbredStatus; }
00071 
00072 private:
00073     std::vector<double> m_InbredStatus;
00074 };
00075
